Part-time Project Assistant at the 5G Playground Use Case 'Virtual Realities'.
 Developed 5G edge systems for 360-degree video streaming using view prediction. Modified DASH clients for lower latency.

work.name: University of Klagenfurt
work.summary: Full-time Project Assistant with the SPIRIT Project. Responsible for subjective quality of experience testing, training objective quality of experience models, and developing platforms for the HoloLens 2 and Meta Quest 3.

work.name: Klagenfurt Coding Game Lab, University of Klagenfurt
work.summary: Part-time Game Lab Tutor at the Klagenfurt Coding Game Lab. Held Twitch streams to students, teaching Unity game development with a 2D platformer, and answering questions on- and off-stream.

volunteer.summary: Explained the basics of Unity to master's students by demonstrating how to make a small 2D platformer in a 2-hour lecture.

courses: Knowledge Representation and Reasoning in Games

awards.title: Tuition Fee Reimbursement

certificates.name: Unreal Engine 4 Mastery: Create Multiplayer Games with C++

publications.name: ComPEQ--MR: Compressed Point Cloud Dataset with Eye Tracking and Quality Assessment in Mixed Reality
publications.summary: A dataset based on a subjective study on the visual saliency and impact of quality for dynamic point clouds.

publications.name: No-Reference Quality of Experience Model for Dynamic Point Clouds in Augmented Reality
publications.publisher: Proceedings of the 3rd Mile-High Video Conference (MHV '24)
publications.summary: A no-reference QoE model for dynamic point clouds based on the ITU-T P.1203 model for QoE of 2D videos. Model is trained using our subjective video dataset.

publications.name: Characterization of the Quality of Experience and Immersion of Point Cloud Video Sequences through a Subjective Study
publications.summary: Journal paper discussing quality of experience of point cloud streaming using results from our subjective tests to gather conclusions and evaluate QoE models.

publications.name: A Platform for Subjective Quality Assessment in Mixed Reality Environments
publications.publisher: 15th International Conference on Quality of Multimedia Experience (QoMEX '23)
publications.summary: A modular platform built for the HoloLens 2 to perform subjective tests with dynamic point clouds.

publications.name: Impact of Quality and Distance on the Perception of Point Clouds in Mixed Reality
publications.publisher: 15th International Conference on Quality of Multimedia Experience (QoMEX '23)
publications.summary: Results from a subjective study on the impact of distance and compression levels on the perceived quality of point clouds.

publications.name: Semantic-aware View Prediction for 360-degree Videos at the 5G Edge
publications.summary: View prediction for 360-degree video streaming deployed at the 5G edge along with modifications to the DASH client to minimise motion-to-glass latency.
